description: Example spec-manager.json configuration for Jira with prefix-aware input mode enabled

_comments.jiraProject: Jira project key (uppercase letters and numbers only)
_comments.usePrefix: Enables prefix-aware input mode - type just '123' instead of 'PROJECT-123'
_comments.projectPrefix: The prefix to prepend to numeric identifiers - extracted from Jira project key
_comments.lastUpdated: ISO 8601 timestamp - automatically updated by Kiro

benefits: Type just the issue number (e.g., '123') instead of the full key ('PROJECT-123')
Auto-increment will suggest the next issue number for this project
URLs will be automatically reconstructed as https://company.atlassian.net/browse/PROJECT-{number}
Both numeric input and full keys are accepted
example_workflow: Kiro: 'Identifier (PROJECT-): [Press Enter for PROJECT-101, or type '102' for PROJECT-102]'
Result: Spec created with identifier PROJECT-102
